item.title: Neurogliaform cells dynamically decouple neuronal synchrony between brain areas
Sakalar E.
item.description:
I am a good girl who loves dance, music, harry potter and cats. I did a good job doing my PhD in Vienna on Gamma Oscillations!

Presently, my work primarily revolves around understanding thalamocortical circuits.
